response.overview: TAMIL SCHOOL PASANGA follows the journey of Kesavan, a passionate and dedicated schoolteacher who is transferred to a struggling Tamil school in need of transformation. With unwavering commitment, Kesavan embraces his students as his own, guiding them with patience and understanding, while inspiring their parents to adopt teaching methods tailored to their children’s unique needs. He also works closely with the school’s teachers, helping them recognize that every child learns differently and that a little extra effort, combined with creativity, can unlock their true potential. This heartwarming story celebrates the power of compassion, resilience, and the impact of education in shaping young lives.
response.title: TAMIL SCHOOL PASANGA
